title: $pick
description: Extracts the value for a named property from a hash

return.description: The value of the requested property; if `from` is an array, the result is an array of values extracted from each item of `from`. Use `$extract` to extract more than one property.

prop.description: The name of the property whose value to return

oneOf.description: The object from where to extract the data
An array of object from where to extract the data

default.description: A default value to use when the requested property cannot be found
